privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: In accordance with EU Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR), this notice describes how RIAL CAFE' S.R.L. collects, uses and protects the personal data of users of the website nheromilano.it

section2.title: 2. Types of Data Collected
section2.intro: The personal data we collect through the website contact forms includes:

item1.title: Contact details
item1.desc: Name, surname, email address, phone number

item2.title: Business data
item2.desc: Company name, event type, number of guests (for business inquiries)

item3.title: Communications
item3.desc: Messages and notes entered in contact forms

section3.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
section3.intro: Personal data is collected and processed for the following purposes:

purpose1.title: Request management
purpose1.desc: Respond to requests for information, quotes and contacts received through the website forms

purpose3.title: Business Services
purpose3.desc: Manage quote requests for corporate events, catering and conventions

purpose4.title: Service improvement
purpose4.desc: Analyze requests to improve the quality of services offered

section4.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
section4.desc: The processing of personal data is based on the consent of the data subject (art. 6, par. 1, lett. a of GDPR) provided when completing the forms, and on the execution of pre-contractual measures taken at the request of the data subject (art. 6, par. 1, lett. b of GDPR).

section5.title: 5. Data Retention and Storage
section5.intro: Personal data is retained according to the following criteria:

storage1.title: Duration
storage1.desc: Data is kept for the time strictly necessary for the purposes for which it was collected and in any case no longer than 24 months from receipt, except for legal obligations

storage2.title: Management system
storage2.desc: Data is stored in a Directus content management system (CMS)

section5.location: All data is stored on servers located within the European Union and managed in compliance with GDPR.

section6.title: 6. Communication to Third Parties and External Services
section6.intro: Personal data is not sold or transferred to third parties for marketing purposes. However, to provide some services, we use the following external partners:

service1.name: Dish.co
service1.desc: Online reservation platform managed by Dish ApS (Denmark). When you use the reservation system, your data (name, email, phone, number of people, date and time) is transmitted to Dish.co to process the reservation
service1.disclaimer: Dish.co acts as an independent data controller for data collected through their system. We invite you to consult Dish.co's Privacy Policy at: https://dish.co/privacy

section7.title: 7. Data Subject Rights
section7.intro: As a data subject, you have the right to:
section7.right1desc: Obtain confirmation of the existence of personal data concerning you and access to such data
section7.right3desc: Request the deletion of personal data (right to be forgotten)
section7.right5desc: Receive data in a structured format and transmit it to another controller
section7.right6desc: Object to the processing of personal data
section7.right7desc: Withdraw consent at any time without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent given before withdrawal
section7.contact: To exercise these rights, you can contact us at info@nheromilano.it or by regular mail at the registered office address. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Data Protection Authority.

section8.title: 8. Security Measures
section8.desc: We adopt appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction or alteration. Access to data is limited to authorized personnel and systems are protected by security protocols compliant with industry best practices.

section9.title: 9. Absence of Profiling and Automated Decisions
section9.desc: The collected data is not used for profiling activities or automated decision-making processes pursuant to art. 22 of GDPR.

section10.title: 10. Cookies
section10.desc1: For detailed information about cookies used by the site, please consult our

section11.title: 11. Changes to Privacy Policy
section11.desc: We reserve the right to modify this privacy notice. Any changes will be published on this page with an indication of the last update date. We invite you to consult this page periodically to stay informed.

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.intro: This page provides detailed information about the use of cookies on the nheromilano.it website and how to manage them in compliance with EU Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR) and the Privacy Authority Provision of May 8, 2014.

section1.title: What are Cookies
section1.desc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on the user's device when visiting a website. They allow the site to recognize the device and store information about the user's preferences or past actions.

section2.title: Types of Cookies Used
section2.intro: The nheromilano.it website uses different categories of cookies:

type1.title: 1. Technical Cookies (Necessary)
type1.desc: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the site and cannot be disabled in our systems. They are used exclusively to allow navigation and use of the site's features:
type1.cookie1desc: Allow maintaining an active session during navigation
type1.cookie2desc: Store the language selected by the user (Italian/English)
type1.note: These cookies do not require user consent as they are strictly necessary for the provision of the service.

type2.title: 2. Third-Party Cookies
type2.desc: The site uses external services that may install their own cookies:

service1.name: Dish.co - Reservation System
service1.note: When you interact with the reservation widget, Dish.co may set cookies to manage the reservation. These cookies are controlled by Dish.co and not by nheromilano.it. For more information, consult Dish.co's Privacy Policy.

type3.title: 3. Absence of Analytics and Profiling Cookies
type3.desc: The nheromilano.it website DOES NOT use analytics cookies (e.g. Google Analytics) or profiling cookies to track user behavior or display personalized advertising. No browsing data is collected for statistical or marketing purposes.

section3.title: Cookie Duration
section3.intro: The cookies used have the following durations:
section3.duration1desc: Are automatically deleted when the browser is closed
section3.duration2desc: The language preference cookie remains stored until manual deletion or for the duration established by the third-party service (Dish.co)

section4.title: How to Manage and Disable Cookies
section4.intro: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:
section4.chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
section4.firefox: Options → Privacy and security → Cookies and site data

section5.title: Consequences of Disabling Cookies
section5.desc: Disabling necessary technical cookies may prevent the proper functioning of some site features, such as storing the preferred language. Disabling third-party cookies (Dish.co) will prevent the use of the online reservation system.

section6.title: Cookie Policy Updates
section6.desc: This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons. We invite you to consult this page regularly.

section7.title: Links to Other Sites
section7.desc1: Our site may contain links to external sites. Please consult the
section7.desc2: for more information about third-party services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites.

cookieBanner.title: We respect your privacy
cookieBanner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. Some cookies are essential for the site to function, others help us understand how it's used and to improve our services.
cookieBanner.customizeDescription: Choose which categories of cookies you want to enable. You can change these settings at any time.
cookieBanner.necessaryDescription: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the site and cannot be disabled.
cookieBanner.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site by collecting and analyzing information anonymously.
cookieBanner.marketingDescription: Used to track visitors across different websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.
